subject: information about shipping
description_text:
Hi ,
my order number is SSN5813 , at what point it is ?

conversations.body_text: Hi Edoardo Strazzera,     Your order has been divided into three separate packages for shipment. All packages have been shipped as of our latest tracking information.  You can track your shipping information via the following link:  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047239669119,SF6047239669182,SF6047239669207

And approximately how many days will it take to arrive in italy ?
> 
>
